tags: now i have myself locked in my room
summary: I usually don't share much about my personal life, but rn we have guests in our house and this aunt of mine is nagging me from...
body:
I usually don’t share much about my personal life, but rn we have guests in our house and this aunt of mine is nagging me from last night that I need to give my phone to my mother - cause I have this huge exam (like GCSE) coming up this January and I need to get a GPA of 5! And that I need to take break from social medias, that it does me no good and blah blah blah shits! Like, if I’m honest I’m feeling like smacking her on the face and tell her its none of her business!! But I don’t wanna be mean….so I texted my bff to call me and save me from her….

Let me know if you can relate or have a nosy relative…God, they are going to stay one more day!!

MASTERLIST

summary: The one where it’s him, her, and Evie.
body:
The Evie Series: Evie and Her

DISCLAIMER: the first installment of ‘The Evie Series’. fluff*

The one where he’s falling deeper in love with her, because of the small kitten perched upon her belly.

Harry thought it was impossible to fall deeper in love with y/n.

The first time he had seen her was something out of a movie, and once he had finally mustered up the courage to ask her out on a date, he remembers kissing her that night and thinking, this is it. And it was. The weeks after were filled with laughter and goodnight kisses, and the first time Harry took her home and she stayed the night, writhing under him and moaning softly, him sweetly peppering kisses down her chest and gently pushing into her. Then she moved in with him, and it was the first time he’d ever been so intimate with someone to have her clothes brushing his in the wardrobe, her lips moving against his chest as she talked in her sleep.

He’s sure he can’t be more in love with or endeared by her, but then Evie comes along, miaowing curiously in the little shoe box he’s clutching close to his chest, grinning widely as he waves goodbye to Gemma with his free arm and coos softly at the baby paw sticking out from the box, testing the waters before a furry little head with the widest eyes he’s ever seen besides y/n’s follows.

Evie stays fairly quiet during the drive to their flat, but Harry is buzzing with excitement, keeping the little kitten as entertained as he can using his jumbled words while laughing in disbelief. She let out a few ‘miaows’ every now and then, but other than that, was content having her owner do the talking part for her.

By the time they’re home, Harry’s got her inside of that makeshift shoebox carrier, gently placing the holey top of the box onto the kitten’s fluffy little head, indicating she should duck and curl up inside of the box, and the sweet little thing does, making him suppress another coo of wonder. He pushes the key into the keyhole with his ring clad fingers, twisting it before revealing a warm flat, holding the fragrance of his girlfriend’s jasmine shampoo and the soft sound of her humming as she moved around the kitchen, probably putting together a sandwich for herself, and hopefully one for him, too.

“Baby,” he croons softly, still not over the voice he uses near the kitten. But how can he help it? Masculinity be damned, Evie was so small and soft, and her ‘miaows’ sounded more like ‘mew’s. “Come look.”

“Oh, you’re home,” y/n says, her voice muffled as her cheeks are adorably filled with sandwich and puffing out as she moves towards him, extending her arms so they can wrap around his neck and so Harry can use his free arm to wrap around her waist in his T-shirt, showering his girlfriend with affection before he shows her what’s he’s gotten for the both of them.

“Wha’s tha’?” She asks while she swallows, eyes flickering to the box keeping her from hugging her boyfriend properly. Harry smiles shyly at the question, his heart soft and hoping she would love Evie as much as he loved her already.

“Shh,” he hushes her voice down, urging her to be quieter, “you’re about to be a mummy, gonna wake our baby up.”

Her eyes widen at that, staring at him as if he’d become a complete lunatic over the past few hours he’s been out of the flat.

“Have you gone mad? The pregnancy test we took last week came back negative,” y/n reminds him, panic slowly swelling in her stomach as she begins to become skeptical of the test. Harry shakes his head, although a soft smile pulls at his lips as he fondly remembers how scared y/n was last week, because she had missed her period and was worried of the possibility she could be pregnant. The two of them had spent the evening taking the test and mustering the courage to look at it. Harry had reminded her that whatever happened, he would be there, and if there was a baby, he or she would be the most loved baby in the world. Another time, Harry thinks to himself.

“‘S not that, lovie, ‘s a-“ as Harry’s about to explain just what, or who was inhabiting the shoe box, drawing y/n closer to the side of his chest, Evie had decided that was the exact moment she would bump the top of the shoe box off of her head and blink at Harry and y/n, miaowing softly before beginning to clean herself.

“‘Ve brought you a kitten,” Harry laughs nervously, waiting for y/n’s reaction as she’s gone stiff against his chest, making no movements or noises, simply staring at the domestic animal with unblinking eyes.

Evie lets out a pitched “mew” at the silence, feeling unsettled as all the attention and coos focused on her seemed to vanish. Not to mention, she wanted to be set on her feet and explore the flat, and know where her litter box was. Y/N is snapped out of her thoughts once the kitten she’s looking at lets out the meek roar.

“Oh my god, Harry, she’s so cute!” y/n squeals, quieting down so she can stare at the cat in the shoe box with wide eyes filled with wonder, and Harry’s heart thumps with joy and he presses a kiss to his girlfriend’s forehead, arm slinging around her waist as he nudges the box right under her chest, onto her stomach, gesturing for her to hold it. But y/n seems to jerk away and Harry can feel the hesitation on her.

“Hey, what’s wrong, pretty girl?” Harry asks, voice deep and slow enough to make her comfortable with answering. He looks at her with the kindest eyes and his intense gaze seems to figure her out instantly when he places the box onto the floor, helping the little kitten out and shaking his head softly in amusement when she moves her paws as fast as she can, immediately going for the crack under the sofa so she can hide.

“‘s making you uncomfortable to touch her?” he hums, crossing his warm arms over her stomach and pulling her in so his warm lips can rest at the nape of her neck. He feels her shuffle and nod embarrasedly in reply, and gives her a sympathetic kiss on the cheek, finding it oddly adorable at the same time. y/n didn’t mind cats, she adored kittens and how soft and cute they were when they ‘mew’ or do anything, really. She just feared touching them, in fear of either hurting them , or them hurting her.

“‘S alright. Do you want me to give her back to Gemma?”

As much as he had already grown deeply infatuated with the curious little thing, Harry knew y/n was more important and more of a priority than his fascination with cats. Besides, he couldn’t just scare her like that on a daily basis, kittens had the tendency to wander up in places you wouldn’t expect in a matter of seconds.

“No,” she quickly answered, cheeks flushing when Harry furrowed his eyebrows in confusion. y/n’s own fingers met Harry’s where they moved gently against her stomach.

“I-i want to learn how to get close to them without being afraid. I want to get to the point where I can just pick her up and have a cuddle with her,” she confesses, biting her lip.

“Then we’ll get you there,” he promises, his chin resting on her forehead, their arms entwined on her waist as they sway back and forth, him leaning down occasionally to press a kiss to her forehead or cheek.

* * *

y/n’s getting there.

Harry’s been patient with her, incredibly patient. And it’s wonderful, because everyone else seems to forget how the overcame the jitters a specific animal gave them, or forgot the jitters existed in the first place. Most people would play it off and tell y/n to get over it, simply dropping a squirming cat who could sense her panic onto her lap. Harry wasn’t most people. He was incredibly gentle with her, never urging her to do anything she didn’t want to, and he even offered to take the litter out on his own on a daily basis so it wouldn’t cause the flat to waft with a deadly smell.

The kitten even had her own room, where Harry would rub that spot behind her ears until her eyes blinked at Harry, slowing down until they shut completely. One day, he figures, Evie can snuggle between us at night.

y/n is always observing Harry when he picks up Evie, his large palms both first laying flat up against where her ribs end and thumbs holding her secure on her backside below her shoulders, so she can’t scratch him. And if she’s feeling uncomfortable, she’ll squirm and her kitten claws will emerge from her soft paws. And that’s another thing, her scratches and bites don’t hurt. Harry figures she knows not to scratch deep into Harry or break any skin, only a gently tap will have her human understand she wants to be put down. The teeth might be, because she hasn’t and won’t grow adult teeth for quite a while.

y/n also notices Evie’s stances, how she follows Harry around the flat, brushes up against him, and acts particularly affectionate when she’s hungry. And she has a few favourite ones , too. y/n loves it when Evie wakes up, because she’ll let out the cutest ‘miaow’ and then open her mouth wide open, stretching her head back and closing her eyes slightly as she yawns, her little pink tongue exposed. The first time y/n dared to pick the kitten up is when she wakes up, because she’s particularly calm, after a well needed nap after playtime with Harry. She’ll snuggle up against y/n’s chest and maybe fall asleep, purring and meeping in her sleep. Or there’s when she’s eating her meals, she’ll be immersed in the bowl of food that y/n can pet her as much as she’s wanted to, and Evie won’t care as long as she’s being fed and looked after. And, of course, when Evie is served with a bowl of fresh water along with her meal and she’ll lightly tap her paw into the bowl, testing of the water’s temperature was up to par with her standards.

Pretty soon, y/n’s washing her with ‘no water’ ‘all natural’ shampoo (which Evie takes calmly, because there’s no water, and there are a lot of warm rubs from both of her owners) or giving her the very rare bath when she’s particularly dirty, seeing as y/n and Harry don’t want to stress the bright eyed kitten out. y/n even holds her on her lap while Harry cleans the litter box with a screwed up face, the reason being Evie gets pretty territorial when someone touches her litter box.

Evie loves y/n and Harry, too, despite the occasional moments when she thinks her owners are crazy when they press their limbs against each other when they shut the bedroom door, or when they’re fighting over something silly.

* * *

One night, after a particularly long day at the studio, Harry comes home. He usually wouldn’t have been this late, but he and y/n had gone to bed angry the last night after fighting over something that seemed so stupid now. Harry had left as early as possible the next morning, and now he could feel guilt running throughout him as he unlocked the door to their flat, stepping inside and expecting silence and darkness while his girlfriend slept.

Instead, Harry’s eyebrows furrow and green eyes lighten in curiousity when he can hear deep rumbling purrs and ‘mew’s, mixed with the faint sounds of someone mumbling and sighing coming from the living room. Gently shutting the front door, Harry takes off his shoes and silently pads to the living room, cursing softly when he nearly steps on a squeaking rubber duck the kitten takes a particular interest in. Leaning over stepping into the room.

And there they are. y/n and Evie.

The faint sound of a Netflix show plays in the background, but all Harry can really focus on is his girlfriend, lying flat on her back on the couch, with the cat on her belly, purring contentedly. The both of them are talking in their sleep, mumbling nonsense that Harry just so happens to hold very dear to his heart.

He moves closer to the two of them, crouching down to first sponge a loving kiss onto y/n’s soft and supple cheek, stroking it gently with her fingers, before taking his rings off and petting the cat resting on her belly, smirking softly as the kitten doesn’t stop purring, but blinks her eyes wide open, letting out a yawn and soft meow before bumping her head against Harry’s and then walking all over his girlfriend’s belly, only to find that one spot and cuddle down once more. The movement, however, wakes y/n.

“Hmm?” She hums, disoriented as she rubs her eyes, hand flying gently over the weight resting on her tummy. Her eyes flicker open and y/n gives Harry a smile that makes his heart skip a beat.

“Hey, baby,” he greets, his voice raspy and deep as he pushes his lips against hers tenderly while she scrapes her nails into his curls with her free hand, humming in sleepiness as Harry rests his head against her chest, enjoying the attention. The kitten suddenly lets out a small sneeze, and they’re all frozen, y/n and Harry staring at the wide eyed kitten and beginning to chuckle and giggle at the look on Evie’s face, seeing as she’d scared herself with her own sneeze.

“Bless you, precious,” y/n giggles, Harry following in suit as Evie settles down once more before letting out needy little cries that she just knew tugged at their heartstrings.

“What are those ‘miaows’ for, hm, my love?” y/n croons, “is daddy home?”

Harry’s heart swells suddenly in his chest, his green eyes following every movement y/n made with the kitten, enlaced with love, affection and deep care.

“Been good for mumma, yeah?” he can’t help but ask in a tear filled, raspy voice, because he just loves the both of them so much, and if y/n can understand how emotional he is, she merely nods with a soft smile on her pretty face.

Harry thought it was impossible to fall deeper in love with y/n. But now that she’s on his couch, sleepy and soft with a small, purring milky white and black kitten whose world revolves around y/n and him perched upon her belly snugly, Harry knows he’s been proven wrong.

•

The one where it’s him, her, and Evie.

wow trust me to create a series dedicated to harry, y/n and their cat. , idk i just decided to make a series of cat dad!harry and of them just being cat parents in general, bc i recently got a kitten on my birthday, and hArry got a kitten, too and i think life is better when you experience it with a kitten :,)

MASTERLIST|Requests are open!

The two of them had spent the evening taking the test and mustering the courage to look at it. Harry had reminded her that whatever happened, he would be there, and if there was a baby, he or she would be the most loved baby in the world. Another time, Harry thinks to himself.

“‘S not that, lovie, ‘s a-“ as Harry’s about to explain just what, or who was inhabiting the shoe box, drawing y/n closer to the side of his chest, Evie had decided that was the exact moment she would bump the top of the shoe box off of her head and blink at Harry and y/n, miaowing softly before beginning to clean herself.

“‘Ve brought you a kitten,” Harry laughs nervously, waiting for y/n’s reaction as she’s gone stiff against his chest, making no movements or noises, simply staring at the domestic animal with unblinking eyes.

Evie lets out a pitched “mew” at the silence, feeling unsettled as all the attention and coos focused on her seemed to vanish. Not to mention, she wanted to be set on her feet and explore the flat, and know where her litter box was. Y/N is snapped out of her thoughts once the kitten she’s looking at lets out the meek roar.

“Oh my god, Harry, she’s so cute!” y/n squeals, quieting down so she can stare at the cat in the shoe box with wide eyes filled with wonder, and Harry’s heart thumps with joy and he presses a kiss to his girlfriend’s forehead, arm slinging around her waist as he nudges the box right under her chest, onto her stomach, gesturing for her to hold it. But y/n seems to jerk away and Harry can feel the hesitation on her.

“Hey, what’s wrong, pretty girl?” Harry asks, voice deep and slow enough to make her comfortable with answering. He looks at her with the kindest eyes and his intense gaze seems to figure her out instantly when he places the box onto the floor, helping the little kitten out and shaking his head softly in amusement when she moves her paws as fast as she can, immediately going for the crack under the sofa so she can hide.

“‘s making you uncomfortable to touch her?” he hums, crossing his warm arms over her stomach and pulling her in so his warm lips can rest at the nape of her neck. He feels her shuffle and nod embarrasedly in reply, and gives her a sympathetic kiss on the cheek, finding it oddly adorable at the same time. y/n didn’t mind cats, she adored kittens and how soft and cute they were when they ‘mew’ or do anything, really. She just feared touching them, in fear of either hurting them , or them hurting her.

“‘S alright. Do you want me to give her back to Gemma?”

As much as he had already grown deeply infatuated with the curious little thing, Harry knew y/n was more important and more of a priority than his fascination with cats. Besides, he couldn’t just scare her like that on a daily basis, kittens had the tendency to wander up in places you wouldn’t expect in a matter of seconds.

“No,” she quickly answered, cheeks flushing when Harry furrowed his eyebrows in confusion. y/n’s own fingers met Harry’s where they moved gently against her stomach.

“I-i want to learn how to get close to them without being afraid. I want to get to the point where I can just pick her up and have a cuddle with her,” she confesses, biting her lip.

“Then we’ll get you there,” he promises, his chin resting on her forehead, their arms entwined on her waist as they sway back and forth, him leaning down occasionally to press a kiss to her forehead or cheek.

* * *

y/n’s getting there.

Harry’s been patient with her, incredibly patient. And it’s wonderful, because everyone else seems to forget how the overcame the jitters a specific animal gave them, or forgot the jitters existed in the first place. Most people would play it off and tell y/n to get over it, simply dropping a squirming cat who could sense her panic onto her lap. Harry wasn’t most people. He was incredibly gentle with her, never urging her to do anything she didn’t want to, and he even offered to take the litter out on his own on a daily basis so it wouldn’t cause the flat to waft with a deadly smell.

The kitten even had her own room, where Harry would rub that spot behind her ears until her eyes blinked at Harry, slowing down until they shut completely. One day, he figures, Evie can snuggle between us at night.

y/n is always observing Harry when he picks up Evie, his large palms both first laying flat up against where her ribs end and thumbs holding her secure on her backside below her shoulders, so she can’t scratch him. And if she’s feeling uncomfortable, she’ll squirm and her kitten claws will emerge from her soft paws. And that’s another thing, her scratches and bites don’t hurt. Harry figures she knows not to scratch deep into Harry or break any skin, only a gently tap will have her human understand she wants to be put down. The teeth might be, because she hasn’t and won’t grow adult teeth for quite a while.

y/n also notices Evie’s stances, how she follows Harry around the flat, brushes up against him, and acts particularly affectionate when she’s hungry. And she has a few favourite ones , too. y/n loves it when Evie wakes up, because she’ll let out the cutest ‘miaow’ and then open her mouth wide open, stretching her head back and closing her eyes slightly as she yawns, her little pink tongue exposed. The first time y/n dared to pick the kitten up is when she wakes up, because she’s particularly calm, after a well needed nap after playtime with Harry. She’ll snuggle up against y/n’s chest and maybe fall asleep, purring and meeping in her sleep. Or there’s when she’s eating her meals, she’ll be immersed in the bowl of food that y/n can pet her as much as she’s wanted to, and Evie won’t care as long as she’s being fed and looked after. And, of course, when Evie is served with a bowl of fresh water along with her meal and she’ll lightly tap her paw into the bowl, testing of the water’s temperature was up to par with her standards.

Pretty soon, y/n’s washing her with ‘no water’ ‘all natural’ shampoo (which Evie takes calmly, because there’s no water, and there are a lot of warm rubs from both of her owners) or giving her the very rare bath when she’s particularly dirty, seeing as y/n and Harry don’t want to stress the bright eyed kitten out. y/n even holds her on her lap while Harry cleans the litter box with a screwed up face, the reason being Evie gets pretty territorial when someone touches her litter box.

Evie loves y/n and Harry, too, despite the occasional moments when she thinks her owners are crazy when they press their limbs against each other when they shut the bedroom door, or when they’re fighting over something silly.

* * *

One night, after a particularly long day at the studio, Harry comes home. He usually wouldn’t have been this late, but he and y/n had gone to bed angry the last night after fighting over something that seemed so stupid now. Harry had left as early as possible the next morning, and now he could feel guilt running throughout him as he unlocked the door to their flat, stepping inside and expecting silence and darkness while his girlfriend slept.

Instead, Harry’s eyebrows furrow and green eyes lighten in curiousity when he can hear deep rumbling purrs and ‘mew’s, mixed with the faint sounds of someone mumbling and sighing coming from the living room. Gently shutting the front door, Harry takes off his shoes and silently pads to the living room, cursing softly when he nearly steps on a squeaking rubber duck the kitten takes a particular interest in. Leaning over stepping into the room.

And there they are. y/n and Evie.

The faint sound of a Netflix show plays in the background, but all Harry can really focus on is his girlfriend, lying flat on her back on the couch, with the cat on her belly, purring contentedly. The both of them are talking in their sleep, mumbling nonsense that Harry just so happens to hold very dear to his heart.

He moves closer to the two of them, crouching down to first sponge a loving kiss onto y/n’s soft and supple cheek, stroking it gently with her fingers, before taking his rings off and petting the cat resting on her belly, smirking softly as the kitten doesn’t stop purring, but blinks her eyes wide open, letting out a yawn and soft meow before bumping her head against Harry’s and then walking all over his girlfriend’s belly, only to find that one spot and cuddle down once more. The movement, however, wakes y/n.

“Hmm?” She hums, disoriented as she rubs her eyes, hand flying gently over the weight resting on her tummy. Her eyes flicker open and y/n gives Harry a smile that makes his heart skip a beat.

“Hey, baby,” he greets, his voice raspy and deep as he pushes his lips against hers tenderly while she scrapes her nails into his curls with her free hand, humming in sleepiness as Harry rests his head against her chest, enjoying the attention. The kitten suddenly lets out a small sneeze, and they’re all frozen, y/n and Harry staring at the wide eyed kitten and beginning to chuckle and giggle at the look on Evie’s face, seeing as she’d scared herself with her own sneeze.

“Bless you, precious,” y/n giggles, Harry following in suit as Evie settles down once more before letting out needy little cries that she just knew tugged at their heartstrings.

“What are those ‘miaows’ for, hm, my love?” y/n croons, “is daddy home?”

Harry’s heart swells suddenly in his chest, his green eyes following every movement y/n made with the kitten, enlaced with love, affection and deep care.

“Been good for mumma, yeah?” he can’t help but ask in a tear filled, raspy voice, because he just loves the both of them so much, and if y/n can understand how emotional he is, she merely nods with a soft smile on her pretty face.

Harry thought it was impossible to fall deeper in love with y/n. But now that she’s on his couch, sleepy and soft with a small, purring milky white and black kitten whose world revolves around y/n and him perched upon her belly snugly, Harry knows he’s been proven wrong.
